title: Rapid resistance detection is reliable for prompt adaptation of isoniazid resistant tuberculosis management
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Olivier Bahuaud, Charlotte Genestet, Elisabeth Hodille, Maxime Vallée, Quentin Testard, Caroline Tataï, Julien Saison, Jean-Philippe Rasigade, Gérard Lina, Florence Ader, Oana Dumitrescu, Lyon TB study group
